content:
Hello, it seems like the install script will do a apt-get upgrade, and will get stuck on Setting up grub-pc (2.02~beta3-5+deb9u1) ...
as it requires user input? Im testing the deployment in a chef test kitchen build
ok something to do with my image it seems
@kyrogue yeah, if apt upgrade hangs on your system, that's a problem with your image that you'll need to resolve.
